parameter.value: How could you sneak up on me like this? I thought you were one of THEM! Well, since you are not, what brings you to this wilderness?
Take good care of yourself traveler!
Take good care of yourself traveler. Would be a shame to lose such a courageous wanderer to those green monsters.
Take good care of yourself traveler. Would be a shame to lose such a courageous wanderer to those green monsters.
